text: General Nystrum Shadar is the current director of the [[Argentum]], [[Thrane]]'s intelligence agency. He was assigned this role in [[990 YK|Khorvaire calendar]], three years after leading [[Thrane]]'s armies to pyrrhic victory at the [[Battle of Cairn Hill]].
title: Nystrum Shadar
tooltip: director of Thrane's Argentum, former general
